short_summary: Supply and delivery of musical instruments and accessories to the Department of National Defence

# Music Instruments Tender Announcement

## Description

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting proposals for the supply and delivery of musical instruments and accessories to the Department of National Defence (DND).

### Key Details

- **Tender Reference Number**: WS4407204433-Doc4639514690
- **Tender Publication Date**: June 17, 2024
- **Tender Closing Date (Modified)**: July 3, 2024, at 2:00 PM EDT
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: August 1, 2024
- **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

### Tender Properties

- **Tender Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
- **Selection Criterion**: Lowest Price
- **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- **Regions of Opportunity**: None
- **Regions of Delivery**: Toronto, Ontario (except National Capital Region)

### Contact Information

- **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
- **Contact Person**: Kimberley Love (SPAC/PSPC)
- **Email Address**: [kimberley.love@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:kimberley.love@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Tender Documentation

- **Tender URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20040285?extsite=MjAwNDAyODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20040285?extsite=MjAwNDAyODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
